message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $105 is a tempting offer, I'm confident this product is worth more to you considering the value it provides. How about we settle at $110?
I understand your confidence in the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
